ygData.subject: The Crew

* His name was Biomass, and from what he remembered he was part of a crew of 
6.
He sat on the floor with the rest of his crew, blinking a few times before 
looking around him and scanning the ship and his troops for the first time.
He knew their mission, from the Great Ones:
1) Seek out the transformer races.
2) Play dumb, reporting that their ship just crashed, and mingle in with 
them.
3) Study and document them, reporting back to this ship ever month or so.
That was what his prime directive was.
Him and the rest of the crew, that is. It was kinda weird, knowing that you 
were put on this planet from a heigher power only to study a race that they 
seeked to destroy. But he would and so would the rest of the crew.
By now they each had their own beast mode as well, looking his over and 
smiling.
This adventure was going to be fairly exciting, and that was good thinking 
for a person who was a hunk of stone less then 20 cycles ago.
But enough about this, a feeling worming up on him that it was about time 
that they got their skid-plates in gear.
Biomass coughed slightly to clear his lungs as he got to his feet, a little 
unsteadily since it was the first time EVER that he stood.
As a 10 foot transformer, Biomass wasn't something to be taken lightly.
And niether was his beast mode, which made up for his size.

On the floor a slender form stired, sighing as she rose to a sit.
From what she knew her name was Sublime, and she was the explorer for the 
group. Like a scout, not to pit too fine a point on it.
Her aqua green eyes searched the room until they fell on Biomass, wondering 
just what his beast mode was with those tenticles haning from his shoulders, 
making up some kind of gray cape.
Her own beast mode was similar but more basic, but she did live the 
clear/blue jelly-like armor that fell from her hips like a skirt, finding 
that the same things fell from her head like blue/clear hair...only one 
piece.


On the other side of the room there was a sneeze, making both Biomass and 
Sublime look over.
A skinny, also slender but not as much, woman sat up, sniffing slightly.
This one was called Nue'e.
Her beast mode wasn't exactly easy to see, it was even harder to guess with 
the two pinkish white seashells covering her chest, her entire armor being a 
sort of off pink.
She yawned slightly and looked over her shoulder at the two other 
transformers, pushing a set of actual glasses up the bridge of her nose.*
